import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { Container,Card, Navbar ,Row , Col, Button, Overlay } from "react-bootstrap"; import classes from './CartItems.module.css'; import Modal from "../Modal/Modal"; import CartContext from "../../store/cart-context"; const CartModal = (props) =>{ const cartCtx =useContext(CartContext); return (

CART

<>------------------------------------------------------

Item

<>_____________

PRICE

<>_____________

QTY

<>_____________ {CartCtx.items.map((product =>{ return(
    {product.title}
    --------------------------
    {product.price}
    ------
    {product.quantity}
    ------
) })) } TOTAL
$0 {''} ) }; export default CartModal;
